entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
